item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 13, 2024 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Garbage Collected Smart Pointers in Rust via Concurrent Cycle Collection (22 points | 1 comment)
2. Web Origami, for making websites where you can understand how they're made (91 points | 23 comments)
3. Imposter Attack – Among Us-themed infrared game made with ESP32 and MicroPython (43 points | 9 comments)

8. A Tale of Demonic Possession Predicted the Decline of an Early Medieval Empire (37 points | 18 comments)
9. HyperDX (YC S22) Is Hiring Engineers to Build Open Source Observability ( | hide)

24. Maybe we should explicitly schedule rebooting our fleet every so often (12 points | 1 comment)
25. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (1048 points | 429 comments)
26. Unexpected Keyboard (242 points | 125 comments)

29. Scrabble star wins Spanish world title despite not speaking Spanish (139 points | 113 comments)
